citation_details.title: Stereo-EEG recordings extend known distributions of canonical movement-related oscillations
citation_details.author: AP Rockhill, A Mantovani, B Stedelin
citation_details.abstract: Objective. Previous electrophysiological research has characterized canonical oscillatory  patterns associated with movement mostly from recordings of primary sensorimotor cortex.
citation_details.short_author: AP Rockhill, A Mantovani, B Stedelin
